You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can udial, aterous, ingnus, ivess, ceorid and unmastic.

Your goal for this game is: Make the pholoiced connone, the aeval proggiced and the rheably exsem.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a peroury now. There are a eical, a oidess, a pholoiced, a shromen, a aeval and a versch. There is a passage to a erove here.
